question: The GREAT part is I have lost 13 pounds in 6 months and have not even tried one bit...YAY for me.  He was VERY excited about that he asked me what I was doing to lose and I said I have not even tried and he said "You could have made something up"...and laughed.  He said he was proud that I was doing PERFECT...things couldn't be better.  I wanted to say "yes perfect for him maybe"The bad part is HE WILL NOT LISTEN......I tried to ask him about some symptoms I have been having and he blows it totally off, and I said Well someone has told me before that you can have symptoms and have a good TSH and he said " I hope you told them they were NUTS ",  he was in my room no longer than 5 minutes, he talked 90 to nothing and that was it.   He is SUPER nice and friendly.   He gave me 6 months supply of my Synthroid because I go back in 6 months.  He said the problem with thyroid patients  is everything is blamed on the thyroid and there are other things that are being missed, like a person with heart palps. its blamed on the thyroid and before long that person is having a heart attack.UGH...I am just SO SICK of doctor hunting and not knowing which one is the right one.......Oh my TSH was 1.26Dana
